description: Try our easy to follow Rocky Road French Toasties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet sandwich,Seafood free,Rocky road,Quick & easy dessert
name: Rocky Road French Toasties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, milk and vanilla. Pour mix into a tray with a lip.

Lightly grease a medium frying pan with butter and place over lowmedium heat. Briefly place a slice of brioche into egg mix on tray on one side only. Place egg-mix-side down in frying pan and top with four rocky road mallow halves. Dip a second piece of brioche into egg mix and place egg-mix-side up on top to make a sandwich, then compress sandwich by pushing down gently with a spatula. Cook for 2 minutes or until bottom side is golden, flip and cook for a further 1-2 minutes until remaining side is golden and chocolate is melted.
Remove from pan, slice in half and serve. Repeat with remaining ingredients.
